mapper.select: select board_seq, category, id, nickname, subject, content, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY,MM,DD')as logtime, hit from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mallboard order by board_seq desc)tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
mapper.update: update mallboard set hit=hit+1 where board_seq=#{board_seq}
update mallboard set subject=#{subject}, category=#{category}, content=#{content} where board_seq=#{board_seq}
mapper.select: select board_seq, category, id, nickname, subject, content, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY,MM,DD')as logtime, hit from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mallboard where category like '%${keyword}%' or subject like '%${keyword}%' or nickname like '%${keyword}%' order by board_seq desc)tt) where rn>=to_number(#{startNum}) and rn<=to_number(#{endNum})
